title: UFYB 201: Unlearning the Patriarchy with Andrea Owen
itunes:title: Unlearning the Patriarchy with Andrea Owen
description:
Patriarchal beliefs are so ingrained in our society and social conditioning that they permeate how we view the world, others, and ourselves. In this episode, I am joined by global speaker, life coach, and author Andrea Owen to discuss a 4-step process to unlearning your internalized patriarchy so you can figure out what you REALLY want in life and make some noise in the world running toward it.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/201
content:encoded:

itunes:subtitle: Why adding pleasure is a crucial part of unlearning our social conditioning.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
